title: The Body
short_cast: Rishi Kapoor, Emraan Hashmi, Sobhita Dhulipala, Vedika, Anupam Bhattacharya, Chandan Anand, Arif Zakaria, Rukhsar Ahmed
cast: Rishi Kapoor, Emraan Hashmi, Sobhita Dhulipala, Vedika, Anupam Bhattacharya, Chandan Anand, Arif Zakaria, Rukhsar Ahmed

desc: Mind games and mystery abound as a detective investigates the disappearance of a woman’s body from a morgue in this Hindi remake of a Spanish thriller.
